info.name: Google Music (Google Play Music), optimized
info.description: A play.google.com/music/ optimizing. It brings control panel to the top and saves screen space and your eyes.
info.additionalInfo: You might need to fix #content { height: X; } value for your screen resolution.

data.title: The bar doesn't move to the top, please help / fix! It's maybe 200px from the top of page :-(
